Ændringsforslag stillet den 14. december 2020 uden for betænkningen Ændringsforslag til 2. behandling af Forslag til lov om indfødsrets meddelelse [af udlændinge- og integrationsministeren (Mattias Tesfaye)]:
Til § 3 Af Marie Krarup (DF):
 9) Nr. 310, 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 317, 318, 319, 320, 321, 322, 324, 325, 326, 327, 328, 329, 330, 331, 332, 334, 335, 343, 344, 345, 346, 347, 348, 350, 351, 353, 354, 355, 356, 357, 359, 360, 361, 362, 365, 366, 367, 369, 370, 375, 376, 377, 379, 381, 384, 385, 387, 388, 389, 390, 392, 393, 394, 395, 396, 397, 398, 399, 400, 401, 402, 403, 404, 405, 407, 408, 409, 410, 411, 412, 413, 417, 2076, 2083, 2095, 2105, 2106, 2113, 2126, 2127, 2137, 2189, 2226, 2227, 2228, 2230, 2249, 2259, 2260, 2265, 2272, 2273, 2274, 2275, 2276, 2278, 2279, 2280, 2286, 2287, 2290, 2291, 2294, 2295, 2297, 2298, 2304, 2306, 2307, 2308, 2309, 2310, 2311, 2313, 2314, 2320, 2322, 2323, 2324, 2325, 2327, 2331, 2335, 2358, 2376, 2379, 2381, 2382, 2383, 2385, 2386, 2388, 2389, 2391, 2392, 2393, 2394, 2395, 2714, 2716, 2737, 2740, 2743, 2744, 2745, 2746, 2747, 2748, 2749, 2751, 2752, 2754, 2777, 2802, 2810, 2814, 2817, 2822, 2825, 2826, 2831, 2862, 2863, 2864, 2865, 2866, 2867, 2874, 2875, 2876, 2877, 2878, 2879, 2882, 2883, 2885, 2886, 2892, 2893, 2898, 2899, 2900, 2902, 2903, 2905, 2910, 2915, 2928, 2930, 2933, 2935, 2940, 2941, 2942, 2943 og 2944 udgår.
[Udtagelse af personer] Bemærkninger Til nr. 9 Ansøgerne under nr. 310, 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 317, 318, 319, 320, 321, 322, 324, 325, 326, 327, 328, 329, 330, 331, 332, 334, 335, 343, 344, 345, 346, 347, 348, 350, 351, 353, 354, 355, 356, 357, 359, 360, 361, 362, 365, 366, 367, 369, 370, 375, 376, 377, 379, 381, 384, 385, 387, 388, 389, 390, 392, 393, 394, 395, 396, 397, 398, 399, 400, 401, 402, 403, 404, 405, 407, 408, 409, 410, 411, 412, 413, 417, 418, 419, 420, 421, 422, 424, 425, 426, 427, 428, 429, 430, 431, 434, 439, 440, 441, 442, 443, 444, 453, 469, 470, 473, 474, 475, 480, 482, 483, 485, 486, 493, 498, 500, 501, 503, 504, 506, 507, 508, 509, 514, 518, 520, 522, 523, 525, 526, 528, 529, 530, 531, 532, 533, 534, 535, 536, 542, 545, 546, 547, 548, 549, 559, 560, 565, 569, 571, 876, 877, 882, 896, 897, 898, 904, 913, 918, 920, 921, 929, 931, 937, 943, 945, 946, 949, 958, 971, 976, 992, 994, 996, 997, 998, 999, 1003, 1009, 1011, 1013, 1014, 1019, 1020, 1021, 1025, 1026, 1027, 1037, 1038, 1041, 1042, 1043, 1047, 1048, 1062, 1063, 1072, 1101, 1102, 1103, 1110, 1112, 1116, 1117, 1122, 1174, 1176, 1182, 1183, 1184, 1186, 1187, 1188, 1189, 1190, 1191, 1193, 1194, 1197, 1198, 1199, 1202, 1203, 1204, 1205, 1208, 1210, 1212, 1213, 1214, 1215, 1219, 1220, 1243, 1251, 1252, 1253, 1254, 1255, 1256, 1257, 1258, 1259, 1260, 1261, 1266, 1269, 1271, 1272, 1273, 1278, 1296, 1312, 1522, 1524, 1527, 1533, 1536, 1549, 1550, 1551, 1552, 1553, 1554, 1556, 1557, 1559, 1560, 1563, 1564, 1565, 1566, 1567, 1568, 1569, 1570, 1571, 1577, 1578, 1580, 1582, 1590, 1591, 1592, 1611, 1614, 1617, 1670, 1671, 1672, 1675, 1681, 1698, 1700, 1720, 1722, 1725, 1741, 1781, 1798, 1800, 1801, 1804, 1805, 1813, 1823, 1841, 1849, 1861, 1862, 1863, 1875, 1895, 1903, 1905, 1906, 1907, 1908, 1910, 1911, 1915, 1916, 1917, 1919, 1922, 1926, 1941, 1943, 1949, 1950, 1951, 1955, 1958, 1961, 1968, 1980, 1982, 1984, 1986, 1988, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2009, 2014, 2017, 2021, 2022, 2031, 2064, 2068, 2069, 2072, 2073, 2076, 2083, 2095, 2105, 2106, 2113, 2126, 2127, 2137, 2189, 2226, 2227, 2228, 2230, 2249, 2259, 2260, 2265, 2272, 2273, 2274, 2275, 2276, 2278, 2279, 2280, 2286, 2287, 2290, 2291, 2294, 2295, 2297, 2298, 2304, 2306, 2307, 2308, 2309, 2310, 2311, 2313, 2314, 2320, 2322, 2323, 2324, 2325, 2327, 2331, 2335, 2358, 2376, 2379, 2381, 2382, 2383, 2385, 2386, 2388, 2389, 2391, 2392, 2393, 2394, 2395, 2396, 2397, 2398, 2399, 2401, 2403, 2405, 2406, 2408, 2409, 2412, 2413, 2414, 2415, 2416, 2419, 2420, 2422, 2430, 2431, 2434, 2436, 2439, 2440, 2442, 2461, 2464, 2474, 2481, 2482, 2483, 2484, 2485, 2487, 2488, 2489, 2490, 2491, 2494, 2495, 2496, 2500, 2506, 2508, 2518, 2520, 2525, 2526, 2542, 2551, 2557, 2566, 2568, 2573, 2629, 2630, 2649, 2652, 2660, 2685, 2692, 2705, 2707, 2711, 2712, 2713, 2714, 2716, 2737, 2740, 2743, 2744, 2745, 2746, 2747, 2748, 2749, 2751, 2752, 2754, 2777, 2802, 2810, 2814, 2817, 2822, 2825, 2826, 2831, 2862, 2863, 2864, 2865, 2866, 2867, 2874, 2875, 2876, 2877, 2878, 2879, 2882, 2883, 2885, 2886, 2892, 2893, 2898, 2899, 2900, 2902, 2903, 2905, 2910, 2915, 2928, 2930, 2933, 2935, 2940, 2941, 2942, 2943 og 2944 foreslås udtaget af lovforslagets § 3.
Baggrunden for ændringsforslaget er, at ansøgerne er statsborgere i et af de lande, som Pew Research Center anser som værende muslimske.
Forslagsstilleren ønsker, at der skal fremsættes flere lovforslag, så der kan stemmes særskilt om forskellige grupper af ansøgere.
Ændringsforslaget træder i stedet for ændringsforslag nr. 4, som tages tilbage.
Baggrunden for tilbagetagelsen er, at ændringsforslaget nr. 4, som udlændinge- og integrationsministeren havde ydet teknisk bistand til, er fejlbehæftet.
